mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPENBANKING ( OPEN_ACCOUNT_NO, MEMBER_ID, OPEN_BANK, OPEN_ACCOUNT_PW, OPEN_BALANCE, OPEN_CARD_NAME, REGDATE ) VALUES ( #{OPEN_ACCOUNT_NO}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{OPEN_BANK}, #{OPEN_ACCOUNT_PW}, #{OPEN_BALANCE}, #{OPEN_CARD_NAME}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT OPEN_ACCOUNT_NO, MEMBER_ID, OPEN_BANK, OPEN_BALANCE, OPEN_CARD_NAME, REGDATE FROM OPENBANKING WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OPENBANKING WHERE OPEN_ACCOUNT_NO = #{OPEN_ACCOUNT_NO} AND OPEN_ACCOUNT_PW = #{OPEN_ACCOUNT_PW}
